io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcManageOrder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Salesmanagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SalesmanagementImpl, UcManageOrderImpl

    public interface UcManageOrder
    Interface of UcMangeOrder to centralize documentation and signatures of methods.
    Author:
    mvielsac

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteOrder(Long id) 
      OrderCto saveOrder(OrderCto order)
      If no ID is contained creates the OrderCto for the first time.
      OrderEto saveOrder(OrderEto order)
      If no ID is contained creates the OrderEto for the first time.
      OrderEto saveOrder(TableEto table)
      Persists new OrderEto with table ID set to ID of the given TableEto.

    • Method Detail

      • saveOrder

        OrderCto saveOrder(OrderCto order)
        If no ID is contained creates the OrderCto for the first time. Else it updates the OrderCto with given ID. If no OrderCto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        order - the OrderCto to persist.
        Returns:
        the persisted OrderCto.

      • saveOrder

        OrderEto saveOrder(OrderEto order)
        If no ID is contained creates the OrderEto for the first time. Else it updates the OrderEto with given ID. If no OrderEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        order - the OrderEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the persisted OrderEto.

      • saveOrder

        OrderEto saveOrder(TableEto table)
        Persists new OrderEto with table ID set to ID of the given TableEto.
        Parameters:
        table -
        Returns:
        The persisted OrderEto.

      • deleteOrder

        void deleteOrder(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - is the ID of the order to delete.
